basics.name: Josue Flores
basics.label: Tech Professional
basics.summary: I am an IT professional with TJX specializing in Incident and Problem management, managing ETL pipelines, and implementing alerting / monitoring solutions internal applications.

work.summary: L3 Support Engineer for Internal Applications
highlights: Maintained operational stability by fostering relationships across Infra/Ops, ensuring all relevant parties are aware of any potential changes / patches
Align team members on high severity calls to resolve incidents as quickly as possible and leverage technical knowledge to assist in troubleshooting.
Led initiative to implement monitoring and alerting on critical business services, increasing MTBF and decreasing MTTR for respective applications

work.summary: L3 Support Engineer for Internal Applications
highlights: Automated validation of critical business reports, cutting down manual validations and saving 10 hours on weekends
Led initiative to implement monitoring and alerting on critical business services, reducing MTBF/MTTR
Maintained all certificates within the Merchandising area, allowing continous availablity of business applications allowing users to allocate and ship products in the US and EU

work.highlights: Scraped live election results from dozens of counties across the US in a timely fashion, ensuring accurate and up to date election reslts were broadcasted to major news networks across the US

work.summary: Co-Founded a tech platform to connect licensed individuals from various professions to clients
highlights: Designed and implemented a web scraper / automated email service used to scrape tens of thousands of names and emails from over 600 online directories.
Troubleshooted low rankings and developed on-site body content, meta descriptions, and page titles in support of SEO strategies at large, increasing relevant click through rates by 70%.
Led the collaborative design and implementation process of the company website. Specifically in regards to user authentication, payment verification, and product organization.
Developed and organized a conference with a panel of experts on relevant topics with the intent of promoting local activism amongst Houston's inner city youth.
